game_description: *NEW UPDATE!* Endless Mode - Play forever! Serve to compete on the leaderboards or chill out and go at your own pace. Abducted by accident and enrolled into the Startenders Bartending Academy, you will have to shake, slice and serve to survive until you can find a way to escape! Use your skills to create delicious concoctions to serve to your alien patrons, use wacky machines and even wackier ingredients to earn your way home. Startenders Features: â— Fully voice acted story to progress through â— Create and serve crazy drinks to aliens! â— Unlock new machines to build, and strange ingredients to create your drinks â— Visit colourful locations across the galaxy or hang out in the habitat â— Make and name your own custom drinks for customers to buy â— Compete on the intergalactic leaderboards in Daily Play â— Never ending mixology in Endless Mode
review_1: I really loved this game and finished the story in 3 days. It would be cool if you guys would a sequel to the game with R.I.L.E.E on earth. Think it would be cool. It was an amazing experience, I had moments where I got so stressed I thought it was nothing for me. I suck at multitasking and donâ€™t work well under pressure but this game actually kinda helped me with that. One of the best vr games I have ever played. If you are thinking about buying, I think you should!
review_2: I love how you guys were able to do a Cartoony Detailed Bartending game! This game has SO much content and the mechanics are definitely satisfying. You can do tricks to WOW your customers. You can try drink combinations on your own time. And one of the most exciting thingsâ€¦cosmetics!! There is SO many choices for cosmetics and thereâ€™s actually more detail into them. Like crab claws that actually click when you shut your hand. Would HIGHLY recommend if you are into games like, Job Simulator, Vacation Simulator and Cosmonious High!
